get.summary: List blocks with filters and cursor-based pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return (1-5000, default 25)

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Inclusive lower bound for block timestamp (ISO 8601). timestamp >= since

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Exclusive upper bound for block timestamp (ISO 8601). timestamp < until

parameters.name: min_height
parameters.description: Inclusive lower bound for block height

parameters.name: max_height
parameters.description: Inclusive upper bound for block height

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Send previous ETag to receive 304 Not Modified when unchanged

ETag.description: Entity tag for conditional requests (use with If-None-Match)

get.summary: List identities with filters and cursor-based pagination
get.description: Returns a paginated list of identities with optional filters. Supports keyset pagination via opaque cursors for efficient large-scale traversal.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return (1-5000, default 25)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Opaque pagination cursor from previous response

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Inclusive lower bound for created_at (ISO 8601). created_at >= since

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Exclusive upper bound for created_at (ISO 8601). created_at < until

parameters.name: flags
parameters.description: Filter: comma-separated flags (identities with ANY of these flags)

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Send previous ETag to receive 304 Not Modified when unchanged

400.description: Invalid parameters (e.g., invalid limit, sort, or date format)

get.description: Returns a paginated list of the latest identity update events across all identities on the chain. Useful for monitoring recent identity activity, registrations, and updates.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return (1-5000, default 25)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Opaque pagination cursor from previous response

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Inclusive lower bound for timestamp (ISO 8601). timestamp >= since

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Exclusive upper bound for timestamp (ISO 8601). timestamp < until

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Send previous ETag to receive 304 Not Modified when unchanged

get.description: Retrieve complete identity information by its on-chain identity address (i-address). This endpoint returns immutable identity data and supports long-term caching.

parameters.name: raw
parameters.description: Include raw blockchain data in response

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Send previous ETag to receive 304 Not Modified when unchanged

get.summary: Get identity details by name with context-aware resolution
get.description: Retrieve complete identity information by its unique name. This endpoint returns the identity summary including balance, metrics, and metadata. For short names, system_id and parent_id provide disambiguation context. Fully-qualified names (containing "@") ignore context parameters.

parameters.name: system_id
parameters.description: System/PBaaS chain context for short name resolution (i-address)

parameters.name: parent_id
parameters.description: Parent identity context for short name resolution

parameters.name: raw
parameters.description: Include raw blockchain data in response

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Send previous ETag to receive 304 Not Modified when unchanged

get.description: Returns a paginated list of on-chain identity update events for a given identity. Each event represents a modification to the identity (registration, primary address change, authority updates, etc.).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return (1-5000, default 25)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Opaque pagination cursor from previous response

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Inclusive lower bound for timestamp (ISO 8601). timestamp >= since

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Exclusive upper bound for timestamp (ISO 8601). timestamp < until

parameters.name: content_keys
parameters.description: Filter: comma-separated content keys (updates touching ANY of these fields)

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Send previous ETag to receive 304 Not Modified when unchanged

get.description: Returns the security and authority configuration for an identity, including multisig setup, recovery authority, revocation authority, timelock, and derived security flags.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Send previous ETag to receive 304 Not Modified when unchanged

get.description: Returns a paginated list of transactions involving the specified identity. This includes both transactions where the identity is a sender or recipient, and identity-related operations.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return (1-5000, default 25)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Opaque pagination cursor from previous response

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Send previous ETag to receive 304 Not Modified when unchanged

get.description: Returns TradingView UDF configuration including supported exchanges, resolutions, and features
Returns symbol information for a given trading pair
Search for trading pairs matching the query
Returns historical candle data for the specified symbol, resolution, and time range

parameters.name: countback
parameters.description: Number of bars to return (overrides from)

200.description: OHLCV data arrays or no_data response

get.description: Returns current server time as Unix timestamp
Returns marks for the specified symbol and time range (stub implementation)
Returns timescale marks for the specified symbol and time range (stub implementation)

get.summary: List addresses with filters and pagination
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of addresses with optional filtering by balance, transaction count, and activity time. Supports cursor-based pagination for efficient traversal of large result sets.

parameters.name: chain_id
parameters.description: Chain ID to query (defaults to Verus Testnet)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results per page (1-5000, default 25)

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive address information including balance, total received/sent amounts, transaction count, and activity timestamps. Supports both R-addresses (transparent addresses) and i-addresses (identity addresses). Addresses must be 21-51 characters starting with R or i.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Blockchain address (R-address or i-address). Must start with R or i, followed by 20-50 alphanumeric characters.

parameters.name: chain_id
parameters.description: Chain ID to query (defaults to Verus Testnet)

400.description: Invalid address format (must start with R or i, 21-51 characters)

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of transactions involving the specified address. Includes both sent and received transactions.

parameters.name: chain_id
parameters.description: Chain ID to query (defaults to Verus Testnet)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results per page (1-5000, default 25)

get.summary: Search across identities, addresses, transactions, blocks, and currencies
get.description: Universal search with auto-detection. Optional filter "type" accepts comma-separated values: identity,address,transaction,block,currency.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string. Can be an identity name, address, transaction ID, block hash, block height, or currency symbol.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter results by type. Accepts comma-separated list of types: identity, address, transaction, block, currency. Examples: type=identity or type=identity,address

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination (default: 0)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return per page (1-5000, default: 25)

400.description: Invalid query parameters (missing q, invalid limit/offset)

get.summary: List available chains with current block heights

info.title: api.devdude.io
info.description:
Developer-first API for Verus identities, transactions, and blocks.

Features:
- **Semantic tagging** for transaction categorization
- **HATEOAS links** for resource discovery
- **Enhanced filtering** with pagination
- **Mock data** for rapid development

Perfect foundation for analytics, automation, and AI-powered blockchain exploration.

overall_average.description: Overall average block time in seconds

transactions.description: Link to transactions for this resource

block.description: Link to the block containing this resource

chain_id.description: Chain ID where this identity exists

update_count.description: Number of times this identity has been updated

primary_addresses.description: Primary addresses associated with this identity

is_multisig.description: Whether this is a multisig identity

description.example: vlotto vs VRSCTEST on chain vrsctest
